FwkSenCnt.MEANING: a molecule which is composed of a much larger number of atoms than an ordinary molecule

ExCnt.EX: Her research uses techniques of X-ray crystallography to determine the structures of biological macromolecules .
It is delightfully written and beautifully illustrated , guiding the student from simple chemicals to macromolecules to cellular organisation and finally to multicellular organisms .
The past forty years have been technically foreshortened by a succession of powerful techniques for unravelling the behaviour of seemingly complicated macromolecules .
